blogPost.title: What are the steps to make a startup successful? Answer by @danshapiro CEO of @glowforge and author of Hot Seat: The Startup CEO Guidebook. https://t.co/fwACsy3b5S https://t.co/MQGp4cGlsh
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: スタートアップを成功させるためのステップは何ですか？Answer by @danshapiro @glowforge CEO and author of Hot Seat: The Startup CEO Guidebook. https://t.co/fwACsy3b5S https://t.co/MQGp4cGlsh
使创业公司成功的步骤是什么？回答者：@danshapiro @glowforge的首席执行官和《热座：创业公司CEO指南》的作者。https://t.co/fwACsy3b5S https://t.co/MQGp4cGlsh
使創業公司成功的步驟是什麼？回答者：@danshapiro @glowforge的首席執行官和《熱座：創業公司CEO指南》的作者。https://t.co/fwACsy3b5S https://t.co/MQGp4cGlsh

previous.title: What are the key financial mistakes to avoid when opening your first bank account? Answer by Poulomi Damany, General Manager of Assets @creditkarma. https://t.co/XGqHVCO4f9 https://t.co/iksuEYtMtH

localize.full_text: 初めて銀行口座を開設する際に避けなければならない金融上の失敗とは？Answer by Poulomi Damany, General Manager of Assets @creditkarma. https://t.co/XGqHVCO4f9 https://t.co/iksuEYtMtH
在开立第一个银行账户时要避免哪些关键的金融错误？回答者：Poulomi Damany，资产部总经理 @creditkarma. https://t.co/XGqHVCO4f9 https://t.co/iksuEYtMtH
在開立第一個銀行賬戶時要避免哪些關鍵的金融錯誤？回答者：Poulomi Damany，資產部總經理 @creditkarma. https://t.co/XGqHVCO4f9 https://t.co/iksuEYtMtH

next.title: How can we keep communities safe while keeping people out of jail/prison? Answer by VictoriaLaw (@LVikkiml), freelance journalist and author of Resistance Behind Bars: The Struggles of Incarcerated Women. https://t.co/VA2e3nsST5 https://t.co/hUsVLZDoyE

localize.full_text: コミュニティの安全を確保しつつ、人々を刑務所に入れないようにするにはどうしたらよいでしょうか？Answer by VictoriaLaw (@LVikkiml), freelance journalist and author of Resistance Behind Bars: The Struggles of Incarcerated Women. https://t.co/VA2e3nsST5 https://t.co/hUsVLZDoyE
我们如何在保持社区安全的同时让人们远离监狱/牢房？回答者：VictoriaLaw (@LVikkiml)，自由记者，《狱中反抗：被监禁妇女的斗争》的作者。https://t.co/VA2e3nsST5 https://t.co/hUsVLZDoyE
我們如何在保持社區安全的同時讓人們遠離監獄/牢房？回答者：VictoriaLaw (@LVikkiml)，自由記者，《獄中反抗：被監禁婦女的鬥爭》的作者。https://t.co/VA2e3nsST5 https://t.co/hUsVLZDoyE
